parse.title: One More Soul to the Call

wikitext.*:
{{Infobox Song |歌曲名 = One More Soul to the Call
又一个被召唤的灵魂 |image = Silent Hill Homecoming Soundtrack.jpg‎ |图片信息 = |图片大小 = 250px |演唱 = [[Mary Elizabeth McGlynn]] |作曲 = [[山冈晃]] |填词 = |编曲 = |MV编导 = |收录专辑 = Silent Hill Homecoming Soundtrack
Silent Hill Sounds Box |标题颜色 = #B87333 |左栏颜色 = #DEB887 |底栏颜色 = #996B1F }} '''《One More Soul to the Call》'''是游戏《[[寂静岭]]》系列《[[寂静岭:归乡]]》的主题曲。 == 歌曲 == {{BilibiliVideo|title=寂静岭:归乡 游戏原声大碟|id=4020217|page=1}} == 歌词 == {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#B87333;|rstyle=color:#B87333;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Enough...with lies... Tell me one...more time... My blood...your line... Is this you...inside?... |translated= 已经够了，你的谎言…… 再一次…回答我…… 我的血液中…… 你是否……藏匿其间？ }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#704214;|rstyle=color:#704214;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Death...through the living... A flame...has no living heart... In the order...of life... They know you there... As you saw it, your plan... A real shot in the dark... Came a little...too late... It's over... |translated= 死亡，贯穿人生…… 火焰，并没有跳动的心脏…… 凭借着生命的秩序…… 他们知道你在这里…… 当你发现之后，你打算 在黑暗中真实地探索…… 然而，来得太迟…… 一切都已结束…… }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#B87333;|rstyle=color:#B87333;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Calling...the children... Conception...and dying... Silence...but screaming! |translated= 呼唤…那些孩子们…… 孕育…然后毁灭…… 死寂,然后是尖叫！ }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:red;|rstyle=color:red;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Damage done to the flesh; What they said in the name of the... Damage done to the heart; Is the start of the end... Damage done to my soul; I know...it knows where my... Damage done to my life; Cursing loud at the chaos... |translated= 对肉体的残害 他们提起时所借用的名义是…… 对心所造成的伤害 仅仅是终结的开始吗…… 对我灵魂造成的毒害 我明白，因为它知道哪里有我的…… 对我生活的破坏 我要大声地诅咒这混乱…… }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#B87333;|rstyle=color:#B87333;|reserveWidth=300px |original= You're here...you're gone... It's not fear...I'm lost... Your God...your fear... Was it worth...the price?... |translated= 你本在这里……却又已离去…… 我没有怕…但却迷失…… 你的神，你的恐惧…… 它真的值得…如此的代价吗？ }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#704214;|rstyle=color:#704214;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Pray...for the children... You lost...along the way... Still remember...the names and faces... Cold...and abandoned... They cry...their fate put into your hands... When it's over...they come... To haunt you... |translated= 为孩子……而祈祷…… 你在这条路上执迷不悟…… 仍然记得……那些名字和面孔…… 是冰冷的……和已被抛弃的…… 他们哭泣……因他们的命运在你手中…… 当一切都结束时……他们会来…… 对你纠缠不休！…… }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#B87333;|rstyle=color:#B87333;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Wasted...confusion... Deadly...illusion... Nightmare...intrusion! |translated= 无意义的…混乱…… 致命的…幻象…… 噩梦……降临! }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:red;|rstyle=color:red;|reserveWidth=300px |original= One more soul to the call; For all...in silence, comes Two more souls to the call; For all...and in time... Three more souls to the call; They fall...unknowing that Four more souls to the call; Won't be all...and you know it. |translated= 又一个被呼唤的灵魂 无止无休……在寂静中，又来了 第二个被呼唤的灵魂 无止无休……接着，及时地到来 第三个被呼唤的灵魂…… 他们坠落……却并不知 第四个被呼唤的灵魂 也并非全部……但，你知道 }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#704214;|rstyle=color:#704214;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Sacrifice...wasted life... Destiny...redefined. Someone...chooses you... Lucky one...close your eyes... Your family knows you're here! |translated= 祭品…无意义的生命…… 命运…又一次被注定…… 某个人…选择了你…… 幸运的孩子……闭上眼睛吧…… 因为你的家人都知道你在这里！ }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#B87333;|rstyle=color:#B87333;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Calling...the children... Conception...and dying... Silence...but screaming! |translated= 呼唤…那些孩子们…… 孕育…然后毁灭…… 死寂,然后是尖叫！ }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:red;|rstyle=color:red;|reserveWidth=300px |original= Damage done to the flesh; What they said in the name of the... Damage done to the heart; Is the start of the end... Damage done to my soul; I know...it knows where my... Damage done to my life; Cursing loud at the chaos... |translated= 对肉体的残害 他们提起时所借用的名义是…… 对心所造成的伤害 仅仅是终结的开始吗…… 对我灵魂造成的毒害 我明白，因为它知道哪里有我的…… 对我生活的破坏 我要大声地诅咒这混乱…… }} {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:red;|rstyle=color:red;|reserveWidth=300px |original= One more soul to the call; For all...in silence, comes Two more souls to the call; For all...and in time... Three more souls to the call; They fall...unknowing that Four more souls to the call; Won't be all...and you know it. |translated= 又一个被呼唤的灵魂 无止无休……在寂静中，又来了 第二个被呼唤的灵魂 无止无休……接着，及时地到来 第三个被呼唤的灵魂…… 他们坠落……却并不知 第四个被呼唤的灵魂 也并非全部……但，你知道 }} 歌词翻译来自：http://tieba.baidu.com/p/526809540 == 其他 == {{寂静岭}} == 外部链接 == [[分类:日本音乐作品]] [[分类:寂静岭系列音乐]] [[分类:Mary Elizabeth McGlynn歌曲]] [[分类:主题曲]]
